summary: This is an FBI intake document dated November 10, 2020, summarizing a report from a victim who alleges she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein in 1992 when she was sixteen years old. The report was filed with the FBI's National Threat Operations Center and details an incident involving Ghislaine Maxwell offering the victim a job and leading her to Epstein's office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly sexually assaulted the victim in his New York City office in 1992 after she was brought there by Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Approached the victim in a park to offer her a dog-walking job and subsequently took her to Epstein's office where the assault occurred.

connections.description: Maxwell allegedly recruited the victim and brought her to Epstein's office where the assault took place.
Epstein is the alleged perpetrator of the assault, while Maxwell facilitated the victim's access to him.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Assault by Epstein
events.description: A sixteen-year-old victim was allegedly sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein in his New York City office after being brought there by Ghislaine Maxwell. The victim was offered a drink that made her tired, fell asleep, and woke up to find herself assaulted.

events.title: Victim Reports Assault to FBI and NYPD
events.description: The victim reported the 1992 assault to the FBI's National Threat Operations Center and also filed a report with the NYPD regarding the incident.

keyFacts: The victim alleges she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein in 1992 when she was sixteen years old.
Ghislaine Maxwell approached the victim in a park, offered her a dog-walking job, and took her to Epstein's office where the assault occurred.
The victim reported the assault to the FBI's National Threat Operations Center on November 9, 2020, and had also filed a report with the NYPD.
The assault allegedly involved the victim being given a drink that made her tired before the incident.
This document represents an official FBI intake record for a new allegation in the Epstein case, dated November 2020.
